amendment.description: Page 9, line 16, strike "Organization" and all that follows through line 21 and insert "Organization, 100 percent.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 115-331 to eliminate the bill's matching requirement for tribal home visiting programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DelBene amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. DelBene.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DelBene amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
